title: 05/21/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/21/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a handful of guests. Hall of Famer Charles Barkley calls in to explain why he would consider moving Lebron ahead of MJ if he wins the NBA Championship this year. John Smoltz discusses his issue with the Yermin Mercedes/Tony La Russa back and forth. And Rich Eisen reminisces on his time with DP at the Mothership.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP's joined by a handful of guests. Hall of Famer Charles Barkley calls in to explain why he would consider moving Lebron ahead of MJ if he wins the NBA Championship this year. John Smoltz discusses his issue with the Yermin Mercedes/Tony La Russa back and forth. And Rich Eisen reminisces on his time with DP at the Mothership.
